Title: Requires the governor to submit to the legislature and make available to the public evaluations of proposed and enacted state expenditure decreases
Summary: Enacts the "procedure for informed evaluation of state expenditure decreases act" to require the governor to submit to the legislature and make available to the public evaluations of proposed and enacted state expenditure decreases.
LawCode: Add ยง21-a, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing a procedure for the informed evaluation of proposed and enacted state expenditure decreases
